e: ￹`Mi~`corah~ `i~ `namal~ `a~ `misa~`nga'~ `to~ `cokor~.￺Canes are shaped in fire.￻手杖是用火打燒成形的
d.f: ￹￺dried and shaped by fire * referring to an object￻油燈，火把

e: ￹`Ma~`corah~ `ko~ `loma'~.￺Fire spread to the house burning it up.￻火已燒盡整個房子
d.f: ￹￺fire spread to include house or trees or forest￻火蔓延燒盡房子或森林
